name: Vortex.IO
description: Strange and action-packed universe Vortex 9 welcomes you! Find yourself in a totally strange and Xtremely attractive world of fighting cat-people and speaking robots. Get your battle lollipop or a shooting gun and show them who’s the boss! Stylish heroes, insane weapons and explosive battles are here in the Vortex 9! - 8 amazing characters: John, Jane, Marvin McSpy, Mr Goodboy, Jess Purrfect, Hellen D. Mon, Mercydroid and Beelzebox. - Weaponry: dozens of crazy shooting guns - atypical melee weapons, heavy machine guns! - Game modes: Team battle, Deathmatch Solo, Capture point. And that’s not all! More and more modes are coming! - Various maps: fight in a variety of beautiful locations within the game universe! - Play with friends: make fights more fun and intense together! No boring heroes with simple pistols, just wacky atmosphere of combat! Show your individuality with the characters, it’s time for the new you!
